import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: 'home.page.html', styleUrls: ['home.page.scss'], }) export class HomePage { selectedOption: string = 'SSF'; // Set the default option here password: string = ''; showPassword: boolean = false; iconToShow: string = 'eye'; // Initial icon name togglePasswordVisibility() { this.showPassword = !this.showPassword; this.iconToShow = this.showPassword ? 'eye-off' : 'another-icon-name'; // Replace 'another-icon-name' with your desired icon } constructor() {} }
